lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Why did Elizabeth tell Nigel that she was going to the dentist?
lyrics.translation: 伊丽莎白为什么要告诉奈杰尔她要去牙医那里？

lyrics.text: I crossed the street to avoid meeting him, but he saw me and came running towards me.
lyrics.translation: 为了避免遇到他，我穿过马路，但他看到了我，向我跑来。

lyrics.text: It was no use pretending that I had not seen him, so I waved to him.
lyrics.translation: 假装没有看见他是没有用的，所以我向他挥手。

lyrics.text: I never enjoy meeting Nigel Dykes. He never has anything to do.
lyrics.translation: 我从来都不喜欢见奈杰尔·戴克斯。他总是无所事事。

lyrics.text: No matter how busy you are, he always insists on coming with you.
lyrics.translation: 不管你有多忙，他总是坚持要和你一起去。

lyrics.text: I had to think of a way of preventing him from following me around all morning.
lyrics.translation: 我必须想个办法阻止他整个早上都跟着我。

lyrics.text: Hello Nigel, I said. Fancy meeting you here.
lyrics.translation: 你好，奈杰尔，我说。真巧在这里遇到你。
嗨，伊丽莎白，奈杰尔回答了。

lyrics.text: I was just wondering how to spend the morning until I saw you.
lyrics.translation: 我只是在想该如何度过上午，直到我看到了你。

lyrics.text: You're not busy doing anything, are you?
No, not at all, I answered. I'm going to...
lyrics.translation: 不，一点也不，我回答。我打算...

lyrics.text: Would you mind my coming with you? He asked before I had finished speaking.
lyrics.translation: 你介意我和你一起去吗？我在说完之前他就问。

lyrics.text: Not at all, I lied. But I'm going to the dentist.
lyrics.translation: 一点也不，我撒谎了。但我要去牙医那里。

lyrics.text: Then I'll come with you, he answered. There's always plenty to read in the waiting room.
lyrics.translation: “那我就和你一起去，”他回答说。“候诊室里总是有很多可读的东西。”
